attributes.review: Simply just download to rate, then delete. Don’t sign up. Don’t text the number given. Trump has ruined America and the people in it. He will not be re-elected for another 4 years, might as well quit your job buddy.
attributes.title: Do not download!

attributes.review:
No one will miss you, boo. You’re very incompetent 🤬😡😢😤 and arrogant 🤨😟☹️😔 so if you will, resign from being president however you do that. No one wants you. A fellow generation z member will become president one day who I assure you will be the new best president other than our bae Obama. 

Hugs and kisses ! 
❤️🔪🔪🔪🔪🔪🔪
attributes.title: RIP trump

attributes.review: I was so excited when I downloaded this app, so that I could support our president. But what I saw HORRIFIED ME. Instead of our spray tanned president, I saw a Cheeto instead. I now have PTSD from that traumatic experience. I can never see Cheetos in the same way ever again.
attributes.title: Absolutely HORRIBLE app

attributes.review: i was overjoyed to see bunker b- i mean our president had made an app to promote his absolutely ✨dreadful✨ campaign. so i of course downloaded it. just to support him further i made a basket worth around 10,000 of merch- barely a dent in my wallet. but unfortunately forgot to go through with the purchase as i had to walk my pet fish. 😔😔 and by the time i got back the ghost in my house had gotten out of the tab. anyways hugs and kisses -gen z 😘😘
attributes.title: so you think this would work

attributes.review: This app is horrible. I'm devastated. Once I opened the app it would not close. I had to restart my phone to get it off of my screen😡😡. It was so bad. I shouldn't have to waste my time like that😪. It made me sad😥. Just how horrible.
attributes.title: AWFUL🤬!!!

attributes.review: I thought this app was going to be amazing ,but it was the opposite it kept lagging and crashing it signed me out of my account. I expected better than this i would give this 0 stars if possible.
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: Time to get the fake news under control-Maga 2020
attributes.title: Love it!

attributes.title: heart been broke so many times

attributes.review: I couldn’t believe this! Our president, our savior, our person, has such an awful app. As I read these reviews, I figured it was just another thing these gen z’s were doing. I am disgusted by this. This is so unbelievably bad.
attributes.title: Awful

attributes.review: This app is a big misunderstanding of what politics is supposed to be like. In the app they request to support a misogynist, Rapist, racist, child trafficking person which is completely absurd! Furthermore they make stupid harmful allegations about other groups and people.
attributes.title: Waste of my time
